D

die() - Method in class characters.Character
 
draw() - Method in class other.DrawingSurface
Draws the screens, and starts game when user is done with start menus
drawChooseGameScreen(PApplet, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a screen where user can choose difficulty level and wave number
drawConfirmQuit(PApplet, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a screen which allows user to confirm whether or not they want to quit the program.
drawCreditsScreen(PApplet, PImage, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a screen that credits the wonderful people that made this program.
drawDeathMenu(PApplet, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a menu that shows up when player dies, with options to restart or quit game
drawHeroMenu(PApplet, ArrayList<PImage>, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a menu that allows the user to choose a hero.
DrawingSurface - Class in other
Draws all game components such as screens and draws gameplay in action
DrawingSurface() - Constructor for class other.DrawingSurface
Creates a DrawingSurface that can have all game components
drawMerchantMenu(PApplet) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a menu that shows up when user wants to upgrade stats or weapons with a merchant
drawPauseMenu(PApplet, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a menu that shows up when user has paused the game, with an option to resume the game
drawRulesScreen(PApplet, PImage, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a screen that describes to the user how the game works
drawSettingsMenu(PApplet, PImage, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates a menu that allows user to decide whether they want sound, to change the volume of the sound, and to change the keys that determine hero movement
drawStartMenu(PApplet, PImage, int, int) - Method in class other.Screen
Creates the start menu, the menu that first appears to the user.
